title: How to explain the Mura effect - Quora

response.answer_text: You’re going to have to be more specific. “Mura” is a term - originally, a Japanese word meaning “unevenness” - which is applied to a range of different sorts of visible defects in a display. Or perhaps you are thinking of something else entirely. Either way, you’re going to have to clarify what you mean by the “mura effect.”
